title: lol shops in Japan?
body: I am going to Japan tomorrow and would like to know if there are any shops that sell lol merchandise? Anywhere on Tokyo or anything would be appreciated if anyone knows a place haha

replies.body: I'm going soon to let me know if you find a place (:
Go to Akihabara district, trawl through the shops im sure you will find something.
I'm going there thanks for the info!

Apparently SEGA stores have pretty much everything including LoL merchandise. Second hand info though so can't help much :P

Apparently back streets in Akiba too.
Ahh I'll keep an eye out for sega stores thanks for the input tho I can't find much here in Australia
